嗜.definition: addicted to; fond of; stem corresponding to -phil or -phile

嗜痂成癖.definition: to have strange and dangerous addictions (idiom)

嗜酒如命.definition: to love wine as one's life (idiom); fond of the bottle

嗜酸性球.definition: eosinophil granulocyte (type of white blood cell)

嗜酸性粒細胞.pinyin: shì suān xìng lì xì bāo

嗜鹼性球.definition: basophil granulocyte (type of white blood cell)

嗜鹼性粒細胞.pinyin: shì jiǎn xìng lì xì bāo
嗜鹼性粒細胞.definition: basophil granulocytes (rarest type of white blood cell)
